channel.title: Server Linux on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Server Linux on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: jesus
item.description: today I installed linux on my new server. It was fun although I need to do it again and again to get it right. For some reason the minimal install of redhat install sendmail. wtf. I hate sendmail. stupid sendmail. anyway. Old Server: -bogomips : 1389.36 -model name : Dual Pentium III (Coppermine) New Server -bogomips : 4784.26 -model name : Dual Intel® Xeon™ CPU 2.40GHz A little bit faster

item.title: irony
item.description: I was just getting ready to write a linux bastion server how-to. HA
